FuncDef:
The description command configures a meaningful description for a RIP process.
The undo description command deletes the description associated with the RIP process. The description command configures a meaningful description for a RIP process. The undo description command deletes the description associated with the RIP process. By default, no description is associated with the RIP process.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description for a RIP process.
The description text is a string of 1 to 80 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-rip-100] description this process configure the poison reverse process
ExtraInfo: A description of a RIP process helps you identify the RIPng process and understand the configurations easily.
